Writer: Hans Weingartner (screenplay), Silke Eggert (screenplay), Sergej Moya (collaboration on screenplay)
Actors: Mala Emde, Anton Spieker, Arndt Schwering-Sohnrey, Thomas Schmuckert
Plot: Two university students, Jule and Jan, leave Berlin together in an old camper on a road trip south, but for different reasons.
